medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was admitted for unstable angina. She was later readmitted on day 42 for chest pain and pulmonary edema, indicating a progression in her symptoms. The first admission occurred before the surgical intervention, after which she experienced an inferior myocardial infarction.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Long-standing diabetes mellitus requiring insulin for 6 years, hyperlipidemia, obesity, arterial hypertension, removal of right kidney and adrenal gland for cancer 7 years ago, dependence on corticosteroids, and moderate renal failure.
